Why not you collect money 90days later) Moral of the story, DO NOT TAKE FIREFLY FLIGHT ANYMORE AND NO MORE VISIT KIWI.com!!!

I was flying on 06/05/2023 from Singapore to Malaysia (SZB) and from Malaysia SZB to Kota Bharu (KBR). The first flight from Singapore to SZB was already changed by Firefly with 30 minutes. Arrived in SZB, Firefly was changing my flight 3! times during waiting for the boarding. First change with 1 hour, second by 30 minutes and third by 20 minutes. Due to the fact, a driver and a ferry to my final destination was waiting for me, it seems like I am not able to make it on time (thanks Firefly) and I was heading to the airport office for help. When asking for a solution, first was - no compensation possible due to technical issues. I have to really make clear, I will be not make it to my final destination and getting a no-show fee and have to pay for the driver twice. What solution they can offer me. I looked into three perplexed faces that couldn't give me an answer. I offered Firefly to take care of it themselves, Firefly would have to pay a separate boat transport of the equivalent of 500 MYR to get me to my destination the same day. However, they could not give me a commitment to cover these costs, instead offered me an overnight stay in a hotel in Kota Bharu and a ride in a cab to it. I tried to explain that my costs are higher than the stay in a rundown hotel and a cab ride there, They would like to find a reasonable solution for both sides and that would be a transport on the same day to my vacation destination. Long story short, I would have to pay for the additional boot transfer myself and could then submit this we hotline and e-mail. One will then consider this separately due to the delays and circumstances. This I did, however I got a ridiculous answer and they offered me a refund of 200 MYR from the 580 MYR I had already paid, which is not even half of my costs. Thus, I am now stuck with additional costs that could have been easily taken over by Firefly to find a reasonable compensation. Just save yourself all this inconvenience and book with a reasonable airline that also have an interest in their customers! I'm done with FIREFLY and all lies and excuses I've heard and read.
Route: Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur to Kota Bharu

Review: Singapore to Malaysia SZB and from Malaysia SZB to Kota Bharu. The first flight from Singapore to SZB was already changed by Firefly with 30 minutes. Arrived in SZB, Firefly was changing my flight 3 times during waiting for the boarding. First change with 1 hour, second by 30 minutes and third by 20 minutes. Due to the fact, a driver and a ferry to my final destination was waiting for me, it seems like I am not able to make it on time and I was heading to the airport office for help. When asking for a solution, first was - no compensation possible due to technical issues. I have to really make clear, I will be not make it to my final destination and getting a no-show fee and have to pay for the driver twice. What solution they can offer me. Instead offered me an overnight stay in a hotel in Kota Bharu and a ride in a cab to it. I tried to explain that my costs are higher than the stay in a rundown hotel and a cab ride there, They would like to find a reasonable solution for both sides and that would be a transport on the same day to my vacation destination. Long story short, I would have to pay for the additional boot transfer myself and could then submit this we hotline and e-mail. One will then consider this separately due to the delays and circumstances. This I did, however I got a ridiculous answer and they offered me a refund of 200 MYR from the 580 MYR I had already paid, which is not even half of my costs. Thus, I am now stuck with additional costs that could have been easily taken over by Firefly to find a reasonable compensation. Just save yourself all this inconvenience and book with a reasonable airline that also have an interest in their customers

A boutique airline, managed under Malaysia airlines. Mainly fly within Western Malaysia peninsula, with only one international destination which is Singapore. I appreciate the fact that they use the old Subang airport, and it flies to another little airport and that's Xeletar in Singapore. Check in was done quickly. Boarding process was orderly and smooth. The ATR32 is a small but beautiful plan laid out in a 2x2. The seats are actually quite spacious and good leg room, stewardess are welcoming and hard working, free water and packet of nuts given free. Overall it was a unique experience. This is definitely another great way to travel between these 2 cities. Get a window seat for a great scenic flight experience.

The biggest selling point for this flight is that it flies between the two smaller airports of the most frequent international flight route in the world, hence efficiency is maximised. True to its promise, the small airports made for a much quicker screening and security process, and my entire door-to-door journey from KL to Singapore (from hotel in KL to second home in Singapore) took just 3 hours and 10 minutes. The flight itself at 65 minutes was rather uneventful, flying an ATR means a lot of compromises, such as barely functioning air-conditioning, smaller seat pitch, a shorter ceiling, much smaller lavatories, etc, which was somewhat uncomfortable, but is a price I would still be willing to pay for the efficiency of the total journey.
Route: Kuala Lumpur Subang to Seletar Singapore

Review: The one-hour flight from Subang airport in Kuala Lumpur to Singapore is a no frills flight. A snack and drink is offered. A useful tip: passengers are boarded from the rear of the aircraft. The last 3 rows are designated as preferred seats because you are the first to get off the aircraft at your destination.

I have been using the same carry on bag for almost 2 years on multiple airline. Now suddenly the bag has become too big. They charged me $100 because the tires could not fit in. I have attached pictures where the bag’s almost in, but the airline has become too greedy and ruined my day.

Worst luggage policy. My personal item weighed 5 kilos while permitted is 7 kilos. They have a size restriction of 13” x 17” x 6” and my bag is structured in a way that it’s 11” x 17” x 7”. They did not allow it. It was a mere inch. The same bag was allowed on Flair airways from Toronto to Calgary. But the Calgary airport charged me 88 CAD for this!!! I was not the only one. There were plenty of other passengers with the same problem.It’s daylight robbery!! They say it’s not about the weight but about the size. Their size specifications are way off from standard bag sizes. I saw plenty of cabin size suitcases being charged as check-in once the passenger is at the boarding counter. All this after paying 450 CAD for the round trip. The worst airline experience ever.

The Flair Airline bound for YVR on May 20, 2024. If there is 0 star for the review, I'll give it to this company. This is the worst airline I've ever taken. My most current experience is as follows: You won't receive any check in notice email at all and then they will charge you $25 for each person. You can only have one carry-on no matter how small it is. Don't expect this company to allow one tiny hand bag and one back pack. (WestJet or Air Canada is better). I was told by the check in lady that they are not a big company so they will surely charge more more on anything including check in luggage, carry-on,... Etc. The attitude of the staff is not friendly as other airlines. It may be because they can't see the future of this company. Not many people know this company So it took me a long time to find out where to check in. First trouble is the hotel shuttle bus driver didn't know where to drop me off. Even LAX police or airport staff have to ask someone else to give me the direction.. You need to pay extra to sit together and the check in staff won't let you know that so you can pay until I was boarding. This is so wrong to give your customers no options when checking in. There no app. They still give you a paper boarding pass which is easy to get lost. The stewardesses didn't even bother asking each passenger if drinks or snacks are needed. It ended up they finished the job faster.(about 15 to 20 minutes) I can feel the anger from the passengers because almost no passengers stopped them for a drink or snacks. No one even purchased. There is no way to charge your devices at your seat. The announcement is too loud. The seat back is so thin that I can always feel my back is pushed by the passenger behind me during the 3 hour trip. There is no extra head part on the seat back for tall passengers to adjusted the head rest part. 13. The dirtiest washroom I have ever seen.  I won't take this airliner ever again. I later found out during the flight that my wife has an vacant seat by the window beside her. So the check in lady did this on purpose. What a terrible company training. I truly believe the staff wants to make the passengers angry so the company can go out of business sooner.

Flew on a routine domestic service from Jeddah to Riyadh. The aircraft was OK for the 1 hour flight. I had paid for meals and water which I never received. So I’m quite disappointed. Legroom was quite bad and the seat wasn’t uncomfortable. But I can’t complain much for the 1 hr flight. I have to say the prices are quite unreasonably high.

Almaty to Karaganda. Purchasing a ticket 11 days before the flight from Almaty to Karaganda was super fast and cheap. Airplane looks new and clean. Service exceeded my expectations.  Cabin seat was quite comfortable. Menu of snacks, tea/coffee, and other bevarages is affordable. One unusual thing is while checking in, they sort flyers based on their seat numbers to make it easier to board a plane.

Local low cost airline from Argentina. Delayed thrice, changed airports 2 hours before departure. All designed to cheat passenger of more money. The planes were filthy. And worst of all: in flight service glasses are made of polystyrene Pay for Aerolíneas, is worth it.

It was the first time for me and my husband to fly with this company and it will surely be the last. First of all it was not possible to charge any device on the plane and the screen was inactive. Luckily the crew has been so nice to all passengers, also entertaining us all with kindness and support. But the worst has been about luggage. We never had a problem in the past but with Flydubai we found our bag completely broken! And we had to buy a new one in Dubai to continue our itinerary. Here attached the photo of the damage and the receipt of the new luggage. Hopefully they will reimburse us at least the bag.

I've taken this flight before, from Tehran to Dubai. As someone who personally fears flying, I felt at ease during these flights. The meals and the few drinks are superb. I really enjoy flying with FlyDubai, excellent entertainment, plenty of options, quickening the passing of time and excellent crew.

Review_Title: "gone done from bad to pathetic now"
Review: The airline service has gone done from bad to pathetic now. The condition of aircraft, the crew response and the service is pathetic now. Will never recommend to anyone even if they starts giving tickets for free. Its shame to say flydubai is part of Emirates group.

I flew for a short break DXB-EVN. Outbound was with an older aircraft and the old configuration of business class of 2-2 seats were not fully reclining into flat beds however was spacious and comfortable, crew were very friendly and attentive they came with welcome drinks and hot towels and the meal was delicious inflight entertainment was alright and the inbound was with a brand new aircraft with lie flat beds again a wonderful experience with extra privacy in seats on the 2nd row as it comes with 1-1 configuration all in all was a very nice experience.

The worst experience I ever had in an airline. First of all the flight attendants were rude and unprofessional. The other things to be mentioned are, 1. My American Tourister check in bag was dented in two corners and the wheel got broken. The handling of the luggage is so bad that I am still counting the number of scratches number of scratches. And remember, this substandard service is after paying for each kg of baggage. 2. While serving food and beverages they forgot it is an international flight. 200 grams of pasta for the 6 hours journey from Dubai to Zagreb. Forget about complimentary alcohol, they don't even serve enough water. Only once they served 100ml water and when asked for additional pack they said free water is over in the flight. Are you running a local taxi service! 3. No complimentary movie, documentary on board. Only Quran is free to read. Keep your religious beliefs at home and learn to serve passengers. And no complimentary headphones, which I got in almost all international airlines I travelled earlier. 4. I forgive them for this understanding their poor financial condition.

Was allowed time off from my military duty for a 4 day pass. Booked flight, paid for, and plans changed due to unforeseen reasons. I had to cancel my flight. I'm not from over here and never plan to come back so when I canceled my flight I requested a cash refund. They will only give flight vouchers. Does nothing for me so essentially I'm out that money and they win due to their policies and refusal to take care of their customers. Would not recommend to anyone and especially no one for leisure travel while serving overseas in the military.
6:10 minutes long flight, they did not provide pillow and blanket, even tv screen not working. No seat comfort. Long time waiting in bus

On Feb.28, 2023, I took Flynas flight XY258, from Istanbul to Mumbai with the stopover in Riyadh. At BOM Airport, I discovered that my bag which contained all my necessary equipment for the mountain trekking, other vital items get lost. I reported it and got PIR number. Since that moment already 2 years passed. I wrote decades of refund requests but neither Flynas nor anyone in their authority has resolved my case. Instead they were redirecting me from one department to another. I have every reason to believe that Flynas is deliberately delaying the process in order not to pay for lost luggage!

While my luggage was under the care of FLYNAS, it got damaged (wheels broken off). I reported this issue immediately upon arrival in Jeddah and included all relevant documents and pictures. Now 5 months later and  no compensation received.  Email communications gets ignored or if ever answered, then with massive delay. Already 3 times FLYNAS closed the case without any compensation for the damage done during their care.

I have faced terrible baggage service from this flynas I arrived at the Riyadh domestic Terminal @ 7.15 a.m. I waited on the belt to get my luggage until 8 a.m I couldn't find my bag on the belt so informed the Baggage service they asked me to get to the international terminal to claim the bag. Once I reached the international arrival bagged service they switched me from counter to counter and asked me to cancel my ticket from Riyadh to Dubai to get my luggage. This is not my mistake to cancel my ticket. It's almost 4 hours I have been waiting. I didn't get my bag yet.

I booked FlyNas since it is the only airline offering a direct flight between Vienna and Riyadh. 5 hours is all it takes and I booked their premium class.  What FlyNas delivered is best described as sad: Time of our flight moved forward by 40 minutes without notice. Check in in T3, but boarding in T1. Flight went first to Salzburg for a 50 min stop and to offload and load passengers while arguing with ground staff on missed safety issues. Seats in premium cabin are very uncomfortable and identical to Economy. Waste of money. Cabin was freezing, no blankets available. Seats recline enough for a 1 hour flight but not a 7 hour plus journey. No power sockets. First 2 sets of overhead bins on either side of the cabin are reserved and used for crew luggage. Crew could not care less where passengers, paying premium prices, store their Hand luggage. Food in its presentation, selection and quality was dismal. 1 bottle of water offered during 8 hours in the aircraft. Crew did not ask once if they could possibly be of help. No hand towels in the toilet. Of course neither screens nor wifi. The 5 hour journey started at 1000 at Vienna Airport and ended at 2000 in Riyadh.

Riyadh to Dubai. They call themselves a budget airline but work out more expensive when seats, luggage and meal on flight has been selected. I am sitting at the airport in Riyadh with updates coming up showing the flight being delayed hourly. I regret having booked this airline.

Jeddah to Riyadh. My flight was supposed to be 1200 but I'm still in the terminal. Because of delay. What makes me upset are that they never made an announcement about this delay and they removed the flight info from the electronic screen so we have no idea when the adjusted departure time. Because of no announcement and no info, all of us have to proceed to the other gate to ask Flynas ground staff and the way they answer me is so rude.
As usual, flight time got changed in the last minute. I have booked many times and it is always delayed and costs a lot. Very poor management and services.

Avoid this airline if you can. There are other airlines on same routes which even maybe cheaper. I purchased a return flight with them from Brussels to Chisinau. Some days before my departure I was informed that my flight is cancelled, I was offered new dates at least one week later, which was not acceptable to me. So I had to buy another ticket on another route: from Chisinau to Dusseldorf. More over, when I arrived to Chisinau the handle of my suitcase was broken. I declared it at the airport on my arrival, took some pictures and sent all this to the airline. Then I got their answer, under false pretext they refuse to reimburse the damage.

Seats and cabin dirty. Interior side wall covers pulling apart and exposing insulation material of aircraft. Seats requires drastic maintenance, seat in front of me bending backwards on one side (window side seat 30 F).
Route: Cape Town to Lanseri Intl Airport

Review: Our flight got delayed from 20:45 to 23:00,traveling with my 6 year old son. Worst experience for his first flight, he fell asleep on the benches while waiting for our flight that kept getting delayed until 23:00. We missed our transport in Johannesburg, just imagine. What a hell of a day! I regret booking a late flight and this is my first experience with FlySafair. I'm so disappointed, if I had know I would have booked another time or used another airline. No explanation, just that there was a delay with another inbound flight.

Cape Town to Johannesburg. It was a good flight, departed in time landed before schedule even though it was a bit of a rough landing due to the fact that the weather condition were not suitable. And it is value for money. I only paid R536 rand and I got a window seat. What I'm not happy about is that the beer was so hot but I won't complain.
Route: Cape Town to Johannesburg via Johannesburg

Review: My complaint is not necessarily with the Airline but more so with the Ground Staff at either OR Tambo or George airports or Both. In the past year I have noticed a lot of Scratches and dents on our luggage. ( This even on the Cape Town Flights). We have even gone as far as wrapping them at a hefty price to try and protect them.( Wrapping price has jumped rapidly over a short time - Currently R90-00 and expecting it to be R100-00 soon). On our trip yesterday (FA 228 16h05 - OR Tambo to Georg ) I was horrified at the condition of my and my Wife's suitcases. We specifically purchased more expensive and robust luggage cases to prevent damage. Well to no avail as they were damaged. One can clearly see that the suit cases were carelessly and violently thrown from a distance. Many people are complaining of the same thing. Then there was also the situation of the Airbridge at Gate C 13 at OR Tambo that is out of order. Many old people and ladies with babies had to walk down the stairs onto ground level and back up into the plane. This is very unprofessional for a Major Airport.

Review_Title: "not by flying with French Bee again"
Review: The flight to Paris was mostly ok, except it was delayed for about 45 minutes while police came to remove an unruly drunk passenger. However, the return flight was by far the worst experience we've ever had with an airline. We had purchased extra leg room on the bulk head, and upon getting to the seats there was a large service dog that took up the space in front of my wife's seat (and even part of the space in front of my seat). Not just the extended leg room portion which we purchased, but alk her leg room (see picture). French bee should have a policy that if a service animal is over a certain size, the passenger must purchase two seats. I essentially paid for this guy's extra space for his service dog! (Again, my wife had to move to a seat without extra leg room). When we pointed out the problem to the flight crew, although at least 3 different members came over to look at the situation and all did the "hmmm, I see the problem" thing, none of them did anything about it. My wife eventually just moved to an open seat on her own. When we asked for a refund on the difference in price between the extra leg room and economy seat (an extremely reasonable request), we received the following response: "First and foremost, we regret the inconveniences you had to face as regard your flight BF720 on 04/30/2023. Service animals are trained to do work or perform tasks for the benefit of a qualified individual with a disability, including a physical, sensory, psychiatric, intellectual, or other mental disability. Therefore, passenger seated next to you was allowed to have his dog outside a cage. In this instance, we must respectfully deny your request." Needless to say, we will not by flying with French Bee again. Buyer beware.

Flyer beware. This is a bait and switch airline. They will provide many excuses beyond the customers control for not being able to deliver what’s on their web site like; it’s labor issues, mechanical issues with new modern planes, really? How is that the customers problem. We arrived late to the USA because they changed to a smaller plane which didn’t have the same amenities as our outbound trip. When I contacted French bee about the differences I was offered $20/pp off a total fare of $3,400 for our group of 4. What a joke. There really is no value to airline. I will pay more on my next trip on another airline.

Paris to San Francisco. After reading negative reviews after I had already booked my ticket, I was bracing for the worst, but to my surprise, everything was exceptional and trouble free. Check in and boarding was fast and efficient. The plane was brand new. The food was good, there was even a baguette instead of the usual roll. I was seated in the last row but the seat reclined all the way, first time I’ve ever seen that. The inflight entertainment was similar to other long haul flights, a selection of new releases along with some older movies. I’m not a tall person but there seemed to be a lot of legroom, more than discount carriers for sure, it seemed the same amount of space as a major carrier. I was surprised to read that others said the seats were tight, it all seemed fairly roomy. Maybe my plane was different? Anyway, I’d totally fly French Bee again, such a good value! I’ve been on over 50 flights the last five years, and I would say this was in the top 5 for sure.

I had the most horrible experience flying home on Frontier yesterday. I was traveling home with my 3lb dog yesterday after spending some time with my mom. When I got on the plane with my dog in the appropriate TSA carrier and my puppy was also secured with a leash that attached to the carrier. I erroneously had the top of my dogs carrier not zipped. When I got on an a steward very rudely yelled at me that the carrier needed to be zipped. I complied with his request and zipped the bag closed with one hand, not realizing I didn’t zip the bag all the way closed. The bag was still 5% open. I get halfway on the plane and another stewardess said it needed to be closed all the way. Not realizing, I say the bag on an empty seat and proceeded to close the rest of the bag. The stewardess then told me I had to go back because the male steward wanted to see me. I back tracked and went to the front of the plan where he told me I could get off! I politely asked why? He said I told you to close that carrier. I told him I did, but didn’t realize a small part still remained opened. He yelled at me well that’s not what my co-worker said. He called his coworker to the front and she confirmed what I said. I couldn’t believe how rudely I was talked to and treated after being a customer for years and over a 3lb puppy. Frontier needs to better with how they treat their customers. I wasn’t unruly or anything, it was a mistake of trying to close a pet carrier with one hand, while trying to board a plane. Not sure if I will ever fly with them again, or refer them to anyone else. I guess you get what you pay for.

Review_Title: “closed the gate and wouldn’t let me board”
Review: They tried to charge me for the same baggage on my fourth flight, even though I had flown with it three times before without any issues. When I refused to pay, they closed the gate and wouldn’t let me board. This airline felt more like an animal transport truck than a passenger service.

Frontier sent text messages saying our flight was delayed for an hr and 10 mins, about two hrs before the original flight time, they sent another message saying the flight was delayed but had the original flight time on the text. I couldn’t get a confirmation from the airline through chat or calling. So I rush to the airport forced to park in daily parking, get inside and there was no one at the counter, I go to the gate and they were loading the plane. Agent at the gate told me if I miss the flight I would have to pay to get on the next flight even through the airline sent out the message saying the flight was delayed. I had to run back and get my bags and was forced to throw all liquids away in my suitcase to get it through TSA and barely made it on the flight. The gate agent charged me $99 for my bag that I already prepaid for days before my flight. (Frontier eventually refunded the $99 for the bag). Got to my connecting flight in Las Vegas and was delayed there over 3 hours. They said there were some issues with the plane. Worst flying experience ever. Called the customer support, they ended up also giving me $100 voucher to fly with them again.

Flew GA 88 Jakarta to Amsterdam. I was escorted from terminal kerb side by Garuda-Indonesia First Class Team member Vianda who helped me with check in, clearing security and immigration formalities and then through to the First-Class lounge. I had fruit platter in the lounge and soft drinks. The lounge team are extremely helpful and will go out of their way to help in anyway they can. When it came time for boarding Vianda assisted me to the aircraft door where, I was meet by the First-Class cabin crew Rizky, Rika, Marissa, Chef Chrisma who greeted me and directed me to my seat. During the flight I also met with one of the First Officers Agam who came out for a rest, and I really enjoyed the conversation with him and the cabin crew. It really is like flying with friends they treat you with a warm smile and they will go out of their way to help in any way they can. There was a good selection of food onboard including snack meals. The breakfast meal can be ordered for whatever time you want, therefore I chose for breakfast to be served 3 hours prior to landing. The quality of food, portion size and presentation were outstanding. I would also point out the overall cleanliness of the aircraft and the toilets are very well maintained. The cabin crew go in a deep clean after every person. I give total credit to the cabin crew. I also used the free Wi Fi, and the connectivity was excellent. When we arrived in Amsterdam Schiphol airport, we were met at the plane door by the Schiphol VIP Team who took me to the VIP centre where we go through immigration and check-in for my onward flight. This is another great service provided by Garuda-Indonesia, and it very convenient and avoids all the long queues. I would like to thank the Garuda-Indonesia First Class Team on the ground and to the First-Class Cabin crew for the outstanding services they provide.

Flew GA 88 Jakarta to Amsterdam. I was picked up at home by a car provided by Garuda-Indonesia and was them met at the terminal kerb side by Garuda-Indonesia First Class Team Nidya Ahda who helped me with check in, security and through immigration formalities. Although the airport was very busy this process was very quick. In the Jakarta airport First-Class lounge there is full menu and drinks service available, however I chose a sandwich. When it came time for boarding Naiya assisted me to the aircraft door where, I was meet by the First-Class cabin crew Romad, Wanda, Cartika and Chef Angga who provided me with a very warm welcome. I was quite tired, therefore after a short snack after take-off I bedded down and had a very good sleep for 7 ~ 8 hours. There was a good selection of food available for breakfast. The breakfast meal can be ordered on demand, therefore I chose for breakfast to be served 3.5 hours prior to landing. The quality of food, portion size and presentation were outstanding, and refills of tea and coffee are none stop. When we arrived in Amsterdam Schiphol airport, we were met at the plane door by the Schiphol VIP Team who took me to the VIP centre where we go through immigration and check-in for my onward flight. This is also a great service, and it avoids all the queues. I used the onboard Wi Fi and the connectivity was very excellent. I would like to thank the Garuda-Indonesia First Class Team on the ground and to the Cabin crew for the outstanding service they provided.

Strange Carry-on luggage policy. Basically your carry-on luggage must fit into some strange metal frame the airline invented to measure your cabin baggage size. My luggage is sold as cabin baggage and all airlines I flew so far have allowed me to carry on this luggage into cabin. I flew Garuda from ICN to DPS right before and I could bring my cabin luggage into my seat and compartment. But suddenly I was not allowed to carry the same one into the cabin in this domestic route because mine does not fit into their metal frame. Of course they asked me to check in and charge me extra cost. I think it is a new scam that the airline invented to hassle passengers and to take your money at the airport. Be careful about your so-called cabin baggage when you fly this hopeless one. We fly FSC, instead of LCC, expecting some margin of leniency. But this Indonesian one does not have such a professional leniency.

Flew GA-89 from Amsterdam to Jakarta from Berlin October 2024. I started my journey from Berlin to Amsterdam and upon arrival in Amsterdam Garuda had arranged for the VIP centre team to pick me up at the gate. They brought me directly to the VIP lounge where all formalities were carried including immigration. When it came time for boarding, I was driven to the aircraft and boarded immediately. I was welcomed at the aircraft door by the cabin crew Victor, Rika, Herlin and Fauzi who provided me with an outstanding service throughout the flight. The onboard service throughout the flight was excellent as was the selection of food, drinks, and snacks. I had lunch which I really enjoyed the food as it was very well presented and tasted even better. The overall service provided from boarding, meal service, table service cleanliness of the bathrooms etc. was outstanding and I would like to say a big thank to both the cabin crew and Jakarta ground First Class Team for an providing me with outstanding experience. We arrived in Jakarta on schedule, and I was meet at the aircraft door by First Class Team member Hilman who escorted me through immigration, customs and out the car provided by Garuda to take me to my home.

Flew GA 863 Sorong to Jakarta. Check in although airport was busy the check in was fast and efficient. The Business Class lounge in Sorong is operated by a 3rd party and has very limited food, snacks, and drinks. Boarding was well controlled, and we pushed back from the gate on time. The flight itself was very good as was the onboard service from the cabin crew. I had ordered a special meal and it was served on request. We arrived in Jakarta on time, and I was met at the aircraft door by Vianda from the Garuda PSA ground support team, and she assisted me obtaining my luggage and escorted me to car that was provided by Garuda Indonesia to take me home. Another outstanding flight on Garuda Indonesia.

We booked bassinet seat as I have a 6 months old baby and was asked by the cabinet crew to move to a regular seat because the bassinet is so low it will be uncomfortable for the passengers next to me! I’ve never seen such poor placement of a bassinet in my life. Had to fly with the bassinet on my knees with no ability to move my legs the whole time. Miserable customer service by staff

My family and I flew on GA-89 from Amsterdam to Jakarta July 2024. We were picked home from our hotel by two cars provided by Garuda-Indonesia. We were taken directly to the VIP center at Schiphol were all check-in, immigration and security formalities were carried out. Within the VIP lounge there are full pre-boarding meals available as well as snacks. When it came time for boarding my family and I were taken directly to the plane by car and were able to board the plane. Upon boarding we were welcomed and taken to our seats were the cabin crew introduced themselves. The team was made up of FSM Chrestian, MDC Yoshi, Chef Prima and Senior FA Sisty and they provided an outstanding service from take-off to landing in Jakarta. They went out of their way to accommodate my daughter’s special meal requirements and were always available throughout the flight. The selection of food onboard was quite extensive. The overall service provided from meals, table service cleanliness of the bathrooms etc. was excellent and my family and I would like to say a big thank to both the cabin crew and Jakarta First Class Team for an outstanding experience. Upon arrival in Jakarta, we were met by the Garuda First Class Team of Vianda and Hilman who escorted us through immigration and helped us get our baggage and then took us out to the two cars provided by Garuda-Indonesia to take us home.

I flew Garuda-Indonesia on GA682 from Jakarta to Sorong as the flight is a red eye it leaves Jakarta just after midnight and arrives in Sorong just after 06:00am local time, however the flight duration is just under 4 hours due to the time difference. At check in I was met at the Jakarta airport by Garuda service Team member Ms. Vianda, and she helped and assisted me through security and into the lounge. Thank you Vianda as you and your team have been most helpful to me and my family on flights to and from Jakarta this year. The lounge itself is quite large and there were sufficient hot and cold snacks and drinks available and there was service team members on hand if required. Boarding the plane was from Gate 13 which is very close to the lounge, therefore only a short walk. Boarding was called by seat class and seat number and was very orderly. I took my seat and was offered a selection of cold soft drinks, then after take off I was offered a selection of two meals and/or a sandwich. All three sections of food and drinks were more than sufficient for a flight of less than 4 hours. The cabin crew were very courteous and helpful throughout the flight even taking a few minutes to have a chat and asking about my wellbeing. We arrived in Sorong on time, and I had to wait only 12 minutes for my luggage to arrive on the carousel. Overall, a good flight considering it was a red eye flight.

I flew on GA-88 from Jakarta to Amsterdam May 2024. Jakarta airport was quite busy as long holiday weekend; however, I was helped by Nidya from the Garuda First Class Support Team for check in and through security, immigration and into the First-Class lounge. Within the Garuda First Class lounge there are VIP rooms and there offer full meal and drink services, however I chose simple snacks, however the staff were very engaging and helpful. The flight was delayed by 1 hours and 35 minutes due to the late arrival of inbound aircraft, when it came time for boarding, I was assisted by Nidya who escorted me to aircraft door and then I was met by the cabin crew. I was given a very warm welcome by George, Wiwiek, Sang and Chef Angga. I was escorted to my seat by Wiwiek and Sang and offered some soft drinks and some snacks. Thank you for your great service and interaction. I was quite tired, therefore just after take-off I bedded down and had a good 6 ~ 7 hours sleep. When I woke up the cabin crew were on hand to prove hot and cold beverages and they asked if I wanted something more substantial to eat. However, I declined and just said I would wait for breakfast and just had some hot team and biscuits. BTW breakfast would have been prepared anytime, however I waited until 3 hours prior to landing. Throughout the flight the cabin crew were always on hand, however there was some bad turbulence, however the pilot and crew handled this very well and suspended hot drink service, which considering the recent incident on another airline this was very appropriate. For breakfast I ordered an omelet together with a selection of side dishes and this was another great well-prepared meal by the chef onboard and served with tea and other condiments.. Upon arrival in Amsterdam, we met by the VIP Team who took us to the VIP lounge where we went through immigration. This is an outstanding service provide d by Garuda-Indonesia for its First-Class passengers. I then only had to wait 15 minutes to get my luggage and I was on my way. Thank you, Garuda-Indonesia I really appreciate the personal service onboard from the cabin crew and look forward to flying with them again..

I flew on GA-89 from Amsterdam to Jakarta in May 2024. From being picked up from my Hotel in Amsterdam South by a car provided by Garuda-Indonesia to being dropped off at Amsterdam Schiphol airport VIP lounge. I was brought to a special lounge area for Garuda Indonesia passengers. In the lounge all formalities were carried out such as check in and immigration. Within the VIP lounge there are full meal and drink facilities and the service it outstanding. When it came time from board, I was escorted to the aircraft by the Schiphol VIP team via car. This is a great service as it cuts out the long queues at security and immigration. Upon boarding I was given a very warm welcome by the cabin crew Mariska, Fesiti, Agnes, Chef David. I started off with a light meal of caviar and then had the main meal of salmon, which was very well prepared and the represented was outstanding. I then bedded down and had a good 6 hours sleep as the bed and clothing were very comfortable. Throughout the flight the cabin crew were available to service snacks and hot & soft drinks. For breakfast I ordered an omelet together with a selection of side dishes and this was another great meal serves with tea and coffee. Upon arrival in Jakarta, I was met at the aircraft door by the Garuda First Team of Herbert and Nidya who guided me through immigration, luggage collection and out to a car provided by Garuda-Indonesia to take me to my home. Door to door service is outstanding. Thank you, Garuda-Indonesia, for another excellent service. I also loggin to the wi fi service and the connectivity and download speeds were very good,

Flew on GA-88 Jakarta to Amsterdam in May 2024. From being picked up from my home by a car provided by Garuda-Indonesia to being dropped off at airport where I was met by the Garuda First Class Team Firyal who escorted me through the check in process and on through security, immigration and to the First-Class lounge. When it came time to board, I was escorted to the aircraft my Firyal. Thank you, Firyal for your help and assistance which was much, appreciated. The flight was full in all classes, however the cabin crew upon boarding were very welcoming and extremely helpful throughout the flight. I had a light meal of caviar and then a good 6-hour sleep. Prior to bedding down, I had ordered breakfast with the chef to be served 3 hours prior to landing, however prior to that the cabin crew kept coming around and offering warm and cold drinks and snacks. The chef prepared an omelet to order together with a selection of side dishes. The meal was excellent, and cabin kept coming around topping up tea and coffee. As noted above the cabin was full, however the cabin crew still provided a very high level of service. The crew was made up of Elis, Rika, Cartika and Chef Fandi and they provided excellent service. Upon arrival in Amsterdam, we were met at the aircraft door by Schiphol VIP Team who Garuda-Indonesia using in Amsterdam, and they take you directly to the VIP lounge where you go through immigration, and they then pick up your luggage to check in for onward flight. This is another great service provided by Garuda-Indonesia as it saves time.

Flew on GA863 Hong Kong to Jakarta. While in the queue for check-in I was met by the Garuda Hong Kong base manager Mrs. Mia and her team who assisted me through security, immigration and into the business lounge. The lounge used by Garuda in Hong Kong is the Premier lounge which is more than suitable and they have a reasonable selection of hot and cold drinks and snacks available. When it came time for boarding Mrs. Mia and Ms. Jess assisted me as I needed to use the train to get to the remote gate. When I arrived at the gate, they were getting ready to start boarding and I was allowed to board without any delay. Waiting at the aircraft door was the Senior Cabin Crew Sari Puspita and Daryani who provided with a warm welcome and guided me to my seat. The flight was quite full; however, the cabin crew were extremely friendly and offered drinks and snacks. When it came time for the main meal service Andy the Chef came around and offered me a selection of food and I chose Cod and Mash potatoes, and this was well presented and tasted even better. Throughout the flight other cabin crew members Maya and Eva also provided soft drinks and snacks. Upon arrival in Jakarta, I was met at the Plane door by Garuda PSA Rudy who guided me through immigration, baggage collection and customs. Rudy also helped me get a taxi as it was quite busy. A big thank you to Mrs. Mia and her team in Hong Kong, Rudy in Jakarta and the onboard cabin crew of Sari, Daryani, Maya, Eva, and Chef Andy their service and help is much appreciated.

Flew on GA860 Jakarta to Hong Kong. I was met at checking by the Garuda PSA Team leader Vianda who assisted me with check-in, then escorted me through security, immigration and into the business lounge. Lot of hot and cold food, snacks, and hot and cold drinks were available, however as I was fasting, I did not consume anything. When it came time for boarding Ms. Vianda arranged a buggy to take us to the remote gate and I was able to board at leisure. The cabin crew upon boarding provided gave me a warm welcome and guided me to my seat. The flight was full; however, the cabin crew were extremely friendly and knowing that I was fasting provided me with additional pillows and blankets to ensure that I was comfortable. They also came around several times to ensure that I was fine. Upon arrival in Hong Kong, I was met at the Plane door by Garuda Hong Kong manager Mr. Leonard and his team who guided me through the Skytrain, immigration, baggage collection to my waiting car. A big thank you Mr. Leonard and his team their help was much appreciated as it has been over 5 years since I was in Hong Kong airport. Another wonderful flight on Garuda Indonesia.

Flew on GA-89 Amsterdam to Jakarta March 2024. From being picked up from my hotel in Amsterdam to being dropped off at my home in Jakarta it was a seamless and wonderful experience. Garuda also provides access to the VIP Lounge in Schiphol airport, and this means that all security and immigration formalities are completed in the lounge avoiding long queues. The flight itself was outstanding as I was lucky to have the same crew as on the outbound flight i.e. Yudirsyan, Renny, Chef Gia and Affiriyani and again they were very welcoming and gave an outstanding service throughout the flight. They even catered to my very early breakfast request. I put the service provided on the ground and in the air at 11/10. A big thank you to the GA89 Team.

Flew on GA-88 Jakarta to Amsterdam March 2024. I was picked up from my home by a car provided by Garuda-Indonesia and driven to the Terminal-3 airport where I was met at the curbside by Yudi from the First Class Team who assisted me with my luggage, check-in, fast track through security and immigration and into the First-Class lounge. There was a full a la carte food service available, however I chose the fruit platter. The ambience in the lounge was good and the staff were very helpful. When it came for boarding, I again was assisted by Yudi to the aircraft and door. The flight itself was amazing. The crew of Yudirsyan, Renny, Chef Gia and Affiriyani onboard this flight were very welcoming and gave an outstanding service throughout the flight. The Bathroom was always kept clean by the crew. & Food was delicious. Every time I went to the bathroom, and I came back to my seat, my bed was made up again. I know it was a small gesture, but much appreciated and goes to show the level of service that Garuda provides. This flight is another 10/10. I did use the onboard Wi Fi and it was good and fast as was the connection.

Flew on GA683 Sorong – Jakarta. Check in process was fast as most people had already checked in when I arrived. Garuda Indonesia using a local lounge in Sorong, it is large, however has limited snacks and drinks, however the lounge staff are very helpful. When it came time for boarding it was well controlled and people were boarded based on seat row. The flight itself was just over 3 hours 35 minutes and the cabin crew were quite friendly and attentive. They came around several times to top up the hot and cold drinks. When I arrived in Jakarta I was met by Ika and Yudi from Garuda PSA Team and as were the aircraft parked it was long way from the baggage area, they had arranged a car to take me to the terminal. They then helped me obtain my luggage and escorted me to my car. Thank You Ika and Yuda, very much appreciated. What I really like about Garuda Indonesia is their ground and cabin crews as they never cease to amaze me with their truly welcoming smile, and they go out of their way to be very helpful.

Flew on GA407 from Denpasar, Bali to Jakarta. I was met at curbside and was assisted by a Garuda PSA Team member who escorted me to the check in desk and then assisted me through security and onto the Garuda lounge, The lounge is reasonable sized and has good selection of local food, snacks, and soft drinks. When it came time for boarding the Garuda PSA was also on hand to escort me to the aircraft. On boarding I was welcomed by the cabin crew and was directed to my seat. There was two selections of food for the lunch time meal, and I was able to mix and match from the two meals. The service was excellent and with the warm Garuda smile. We arrived in Jakarta slightly ahead of schedule, and I was met at the plane door by Firyal from the Garuda PSA Team who assisted me with baggage collection and escorted me to my car. Thank you, Firyal. The service from check in until receiving my luggage in Jakarta was outstanding.

Review_Title: "lack of lounge access in Tokyo Haneda"
Review: Flew GA875 Tokyo Haneda to Jakarta. The check in process was quite chaotic as there was only a single desk open for all business class which meant long queues building up. Eventually when I finished the check in process, I was given a voucher to access the TIAT Lounge, however upon entering the lounge I was informed that I would have to wait outside as the lounge was full. Therefore, I decided to use my AMEX Card which allows me access to the SKY lounge. When it came time to board, both Business and Economy class passengers were boarded at the same time, however this did not lead to any delays in boarding. When entering the aircraft, the cabin crew gave a warm welcome. The flight itself was uneventful, however the meals offered were very well prepared and with sufficient portions that I just went with a salad and main course both of which were tasty and well presented. We arrived in Jakarta on schedule and when the aircraft door was opened, I was met by Vianda from the Garuda PSA Team who escorted me through immigration, baggage collect, customs and assisted me in getting a taxi. Thank you very much Vianda. My conclusion is that the onboard flight and ground services in Jakarta were outstanding, however these we let down by the long check in times and lack of lounge access in Tokyo Haneda airport. I note that Garuda uses a local company at Haneda to help with the check in process, however that should not be an excuse.

Flew GA874 Jakarta to Tokyo Haneda overnight flight. Check in was quite fast and I was then escorted through security, immigration and into the Garuda lounge. This was a great fast-track service. The Garuda lounge was quite comfortable, and there was a very good selection of food, snacks, and drinks available, and the lounge staff were very attentive. When it came time to board, I was assisted by Ryan from the Garuda PSA team who help provide a buggy to take me to the remote area of the airport from where to board the aircraft. At the gate I was allowed to board right away. The Garuda cabin crew gave me a very warm welcome and guided me to my seat. As it was an overnight flight, I tried to get some sleep, however when awoke and went to the toilet, I was met by the cabin crew and Chef Erwin who presented me with a birthday cake. It was a very pleasantly surprised and I really appreciate the effort of the crew to recognize that it was my birthday and to prepare the cake, therefore I would like to thank the business class cabin crew made up of Budi Handoko, Ellyza, Ayu, Zulfa and Chef Erwin who really made my day by proving this small, but significant gesture. I have been flying for over 45 years and many times on my birthday, however this is the first time that this has happened. When it came for breakfast, I was treated with a very good selection of food, and I chose the omelet that was garnished with a good selection of side dishes. Upon arrival in Haneda I was met at the plane door by and escorted through immigration, customs and out to the taxi. I very much appreciate all the help, assistance and especially the birthday cake onboard. Thank you very much Garuda-Indonesia.

Flew on GA-89 Amsterdam to Jakarta December 30th. I was picked up at my hotel by a car provided by Garuda-Indonesia and driven to the VIP Center at Schiphol airport. In the VIP Center they take care of all check in and immigration procedures without me having to leave the VIP Lounge. This is an outstanding service provided by Garuda-Indonesia. The aircraft was parked in a remote area; however, I was driven to the aircraft by the VIP Center car and was allowed to board immediately. I was welcomed at the aircraft door by the cabin crew with the warm welcoming Garuda-Indonesia smile. After takeoff there was large selection of food on offer from starters, main course, deserts, and cheese board. I opted for the main course only and chose salmon. The salmon was well presented and tasted savory. I then chose to rest, and the cabin crew made up the bed. I had a good rest, and when I woke up the cabin crew were on hand to serve snacks and hot and cold drinks. With less than three hours to landing the onboard chef offered a cooked breakfast. I chose an omelet which was garnished with sausage, tomatoes etc. Anoth great meal. The service from boarding in Amsterdam to landing in Jakarta was exceptional from the team made up of Ely Siswanto, Maria Dewi, Desti and Chef Erwin. The cabin crew was excellent and provided an outstanding service. What I really love about Garuda-Indonesia is their consistency in the service they provide both on the ground and in the air, they are true professionals and the SKYTRAX 2023 best cabin crew definitely holds true. We arrived in Jakarta 23 minutes ahead of schedule and I was met at the aircraft door by Vianda from the First-Class Ground staff who helped guide me through immigration, baggage collection, customs and out to a car provided by Garuda-Indonesia to take me to my home. Thank you to all on those that served on this GA89 flight both on the ground and in the air, for another excellent flight on Garuda-Indonesia.

Flew on GA-88 Jakarta to Amsterdam. I was picked up at my home by a car provided by Garuda-Indonesia. I was then met at the curb side at the airport and was assisted to the check in area, through immigration and into the First-Class lounge. During this process I was assisted from curb side through to boarding the aircraft by Ms. Vianda. Thank you Vianda your help, assistance and professionalism was much appreciated. The onboard service was outstanding from the team made up of Percy Siegers, Vivik, Annisaa and Chef Fredi Saputra. The cabin crews’ eye for detail was exceptional and they were on hand throughout the flight and provided an outstanding service with their personal touch. We arrived in Amsterdam a little behind schedule due to strong headwinds, however I had more than sufficient time to catch my connecting flight. In Amsterdam airport Garuda-Indonesia using the VIP Center who picks you up from the aircraft and takes to the VIP lounge and then to my connecting flight. This is another great service provided by Garuda-Indonesia Thank you, Garuda-Indonesia, for another outstanding flight.

Flew on GA-683 Sorong – Jakarta, although the flight was full the check in process was quite quick and the staff were very friendly. There is a small lounge in Sorong that Garuda Indonesia uses. The lounge has a limited selection of food and snacks, however sufficient for short stay. When it came time for boarding, there was a long queue, however the boarding process was managed well. I had pre-order a diabetic meal and after takeoff the cabin crew came and asked when I wanted to eat. The diabetic meal served was quite savory and it was served with hot and cold drinks. The cabin crew of Tarmizal Indra and Tiara Veroosta where very helpful and were on hand throughout the flight. Thank you both for a great service. When I landed in Jakarta, I was meet at the plane door by Hardi from Garuda Premium Services and he helped and assisted me obtaining my luggage. Thank you Hardi. Overall, an excellent service.

Flew on GA-683 Sorong – Jakarta, although the flight was full the check in process was quite quick and the staff were very friendly. There is a small lounge in Sorong that Garuda Indonesia uses. The lounge has a limited selection of food and snacks, however sufficient for short stay. When it came time for boarding, there was a long queue, however the boarding process was managed well. I had pre-order a diabetic meal and after takeoff the cabin crew came and asked when I wanted to eat. The diabetic meal served was quite savory and it was served with hot and cold drinks. The cabin crew of Tarmizal Indra and Tiara Veroosta where very helpful and were on hand throughout the flight. Thank you both for a great service. When I landed in Jakarta, I was meet at the plane door by Hardi from Garuda Premium Services and he helped and assisted me obtaining my luggage. Thank you Hardi. Overall, an excellent service.
Excellent service, always pleasant to fly with Garuda Indonesia. I strongly recommend this service. Very polite crew and friendly. Garuda is one of the best companies.

Flew on GA402 from Jakarta to Denpasar as the flight is an early morning departure, however Garuda-Indonesia check-in desks are always open. In the priority check-in area I was assisted by Heibert from the Garuda-Indonesia ground support staff who help check me in and then escorted me through security and into the VIP Lounge. The boarding gate was very close to the lounge and when it came time for boarding, I was again assisted by Heibert who escorted me to the plane door. I was given a warm welcome by the Garuda cabin crew and was escorted to my seat. The flight was full, however the cabin crew as usual were quite helpful and friendly. There were three choices for breakfast, however as I had some food in the lounge I went with a light snack with tea, We arrived in Denpasar 19 minutes ahead of schedule and I was meet at the aircraft door by Garuda premium service team member Sony who escorted me to the baggage area and on to my car. If people read my reviews, they may think it is cut and paste review, however Garuda-Indonesia really keeps providing a consistent high level of excellent service both on the ground and in the air.

I recently enjoyed a pleasure flight, and I must say that the service truly stood out as the most remarkable aspect of my journey. It's no surprise that Garuda Indonesia was awarded as The World's Best Cabin Crew. The attentiveness and professionalism of cabin crew made the experience enjoyable and memorable. Starting with the positive aspects, the welcome drink and bottle of water provided on the ground were appreciated. However, including a small sweet treat, such as a piece of candy or some snacks, would have added a delightful touch to the welcome service. On this flight, I requested a seafood meal. The first service commenced approximately 25 minutes after take-off, during which a starter of salmon tart was served. Before the lights were turned out, which was approximately an hour after take-off, the second service began. I received a tuna sandwich as a light snack or an in-between course. One of the cabin crew accidentally offered me a regular meal, and I opted for the chicken pie, resulting in my receiving two snacks. Despite this, it enhanced my dining experience satisfaction. In terms of the meal schedule, I suggest serving a hot meal during the light snack or in-between course service, not just during breakfast or the pre-landing meal. This adjustment would provide passengers with a satisfying dinner option and contribute to a more comfortable journey pace. Approximately halfway through the journey, juice service was provided. Integrating the light snack or in-between course during the juice service, midway through the flight, could better align with passengers' hunger levels and create a more seamless dining experience. About an hour and 50 minutes prior to landing, breakfast or a pre-landing meal was served, which consisted of appetizers and a hot meal. For the appetizer, I received mixed fruit, yogurt, a bread roll accompanied by strawberry jam and butter. For the hot meal, I was served stir-fry noodles with sweet and sour seafood. Overall, my journey with Garuda Indonesia was made truly memorable by the outstanding service and thoughtful meal offerings.

Flew on GA683 from Sorong to Jakarta. The flight is scheduled for early morning departure and the flight left on time and arrived in Jakarta ahead of schedule. Sorong airport gets quite busy early morning as there are many departures. There are two Garuda check-in desks and the check-in staff we quite friendly. When it came time for boarding the process was organized as they were boarded from both the front and rear of the aircraft. There is a lounge in Sorong that Garuda Business Class passengers can use. The lounge is small and is not operated by Garuda, however the lounge team were quite helpful even though there are limited snacks available, however there was Coffee, Tea, and some soft drinks available. The flight was good and the cabin crew quite helpful and very friendly. I had ordered a special meal, and I was informed I could have the meal anytime I wanted after take-off. The meal and soft drinks available were more than sufficient. We arrived in Jakarta ahead of schedule and I was meet at the aircraft door by Roy from Garuda premium service team who escorted to the baggage area. My baggage was delivered very quickly. Garuda-Indonesia keeps providing a consistent high level of service.

The service truly stood out as the most remarkable aspect of my journey.  The attentiveness and professionalism of cabin crew made the experience enjoyable and memorable. Upon taking my seat, the crew handed me a warm towel and offered a welcome drink. I chose a glass of champagne. Additionally, a bottle of water and amenity kits were placed on my seat. The first service included a snack (mixed nuts), which I received about 25 minutes after take-off. During the flight, I requested a special seafood meal. The second service (entree) commenced approximately an hour after take-off, consisting of king prawns with vermicelli noodles and mixed veggies. A bread roll and butter were also served on the entree tray. A suggestion for improvement is for Garuda to use pure butter instead of canola spread. The third service (main course) was served around 2 hours after take-off, featuring a hot meal of rice with sweet & sour seafood mix and cap cay. A dessert, mango pudding, was also included on the main course tray. I strongly recommend serving the dessert separately from the main course, while placing the bread on the entree tray and the side dishes on the main course tray. This approach allows passengers to fully savor each dish, enhancing the overall dining experience on your flights. After finishing the main course, a crew member offered me tea/coffee while I enjoyed the dessert. I opted for a cup of tea, which came with a mini chocolate bar. Approximately 2-3 hours before landing, sweet and savory snacks were offered, along with a beverage service. An hour prior to landing, a pre-landing snack and a final beverage service were served. The snack consisted of a salmon & cucumber sandwich with seaweed-flavored chips. Another area for improvement is the amenity kits. The amenity kits included: - A dental kit with a toothbrush and toothpaste. - Earplugs and an eye mask for a good night's sleep. - Plush socks and a cozy, high-quality blanket. - A curated selection of magazines and a tablet loaded with the latest movies and TV shows. Amenity kits that were missing or should have been included: - High-end skincare products, including moisturizer, lip balm, and facial mist. - Dental floss. - A neck pillow that provides excellent support for relaxation. - A stylish pen and notebook for jotting down thoughts. - Noise-Canceling headphones for enjoying in-flight entertainment. - Tissues and wet wipes for convenience.

I flew on Garuda-Indonesia onboard GA089 from Amsterdam to Jakarta on October 1st, 2023. I was picked up from my hotel in Amsterdam by a car provided by Garuda-Indonesia and was dropped off at the VIP Center at Schiphol Airport where I was met by the VIP Team who assisted me with check in and immigration formalities. This is a seamless service and a very good way of avoiding all the long Check-In and Security queues. In the VIP lounge, drinks, snacks, and a full menu was available. When it came time for boarding, I was driven to the aircraft. The flight was slighted delayed due to Air Traffic Control restrictions, which meant we took off approx. 1 hour from the schedule departure time, however we landed in Jakarta only 35 minutes late. After take-off, I was provided with a full à la carte menu. I chose a Crayfish Pate for starters and a main course of Salmon. The meals were very well presented and tasty. The seat was comfortable and when it came time for sleeping a full bedding service was provided, and I ended up having over 6 hours of sleep. When I woke up the cabin crew were available to provide drinks and snacks. I ordered breakfast which was served approx. 2.5 hours prior to landing. However, breakfast could have been served at a time of my choosing. The section and quality of food served throughout the flight was excellent. In the first class cabin the team of Willy Wilman, Rachmawati Prihastuti, Ade Masdiah and Chef Ahmad Fauzi were very attentive throughout the flight and their personal touch and friendliness was much appreciated, therefore I would like to thank them all for the outstanding service afforded to me. Upon arrival in Jakarta, I was met at the aircraft door by Vianda from Garuda Frist Class Team who escorted through immigration, customs and on to a waiting car that was provided by Garuda -Indonesia to take me home. Another excellent long-distance flight on Garuda-Indonesia.

Flew on GA-402 Jakarta - Denpasar. Check in was quite fast as it was an early morning flight. After check-in I was then escorted by Mr. Noval to the Garuda lounge. In the lounge breakfast was being served as well tea, coffee, together with juices and other snacks. The Staff in lounge were quite helpful and the lounge is itself was very clean and here was sufficient space to find somewhere to sit. There is a fast free Wi-Fi and log on details are located throughout the lounge. When it came time for boarding Novel escorted me to the gate. The flight itself was an early morning flight and was full. There was full meal service onboard, and I chose the omelette together with tea. The overall food quality and service was quite good. We arrived in Denpasar a little behind schedule however it was not an inconvenience. I was met at the aircraft door by Garuda PSA Team member Mr. Sony who escorted me to the baggage area. I collected my baggage and was on my way within 10 minutes after landing. That is some service. Garuda-Indonesia consistently provides a very high and consistent level of service.

Flew on GA-089 from Amsterdam to Jakarta. I know that I regularly write about Garuda-Indonesia, however I was lucky to have flown with the same crew as the inbound flight. The service on Garuda-Indonesia is always good however on the outboard flight there was something I had never notices before. Every time you left your seat weather to go the toilet or somewhere else the crew always adjusted you seat and ensure that the seat belt was reset correctly. It is such a small gesture, but remarkable that the cabin crew even though about carrying out such a function. Check in was very good and then I proceeded to the Schiphol VIP center which Garuda-Indonesia provide a spart of their First-Class service. It is an outstanding service. Upon boarding the aircraft, you get the same outstanding Garuda-Indonesia welcome. Service throughout the fight was excellent. The meals servred onboard were outstanding by Pak Andi teh Chef onboard. On up arrive in Jakarta I was meet at the aircraft door by both Nidya and Fauzy who guided me through Immigration and customs. I would like to say I big thank you to both of you. I really appreciate the service that you both provided.

I flew on Garuda-Indonesia on GA088 from Jakarta to Amsterdam in July 2023. I was pick up from my home by Garuda-Indonesia driver and dropped off at Terminal-3 where I was greeted by the Garuda PSA Ground team who helped me check in, get through immigration and into the lounge. In the first-class lounge, drinks, snacks, and full pre-boarding menu was available, however I chose fruits only. When it came time to board, I was escorted to the aircraft. After takeoff, the chef provided me with a menu, however as I wanted to sleep, therefore I chose a lite snack. I was able to get a good 6 hours sleep and the cabin crew were always available to provide drinks and snacks. I order breakfast which was served approx. 3 hours prior to landing. In fact, breakfast could have been served anytime of my choosing. The section of food for breakfast was quite good. In the first class cabin the team of Vvi Dewi, Afrodita, Chef Andi Susanto and Prisila were very attentive through out the flight and their personal touch was much appreciated and I would like to thank them for their outstanding service. Upon arrival in Amsterdam, I was met at the plane door by the Schiphol VIP Center team which is part of Garuda Indonesia service. Where I transferred to the VIP lounge to await my connecting flight.

After takeoff we were provided with a selection of meals, the food was prepared onboard by Chef Yudi, and it was very well presented with very good portions. We had two full meals onboard during our long flight, and the cabin crew were available throughout the flight to provide drinks and snacks if required. The cabin crew were every attentive to me and my family including my two children. The crew were very professional and very engaging and ensuring that we felt comfortable. I would rate the overall experience as excellent and would like to thank the cabin crew Herry, Renny, Annisaa and Chef Yudi for their help and service to my family and I, they certainly made us feel at home. Upon arrival in Jakarta, we were met at the gate by the Garuda-Indonesia ground support team who escorted us through fast-track immigration and customs. Garuda had also provided me with ground transportation to take us home. However, one area of improvement is that I would recommend that Garuda restarts providing hand towels for freshening up as these are much better that the hand wipe tissues currently provided.

My family and I flew on Garuda Indonesia on GA088 from Jakarta to Amsterdam in June 2023. On arrival at Jakarta Terminal-3 the Garuda ground support team were waiting to help and assist us with our luggage and check-in. After checking in we were escorted through immigration and into the lounge. Drinks, snacks, and full pre-boarding menu was available . When it time came for boarding, we were escorted to the aircraft. After takeoff, the chef provided us with a very good selection of meals, when the food arrived as each meal was prepared by the Chef onboard it was very well presented and tasted even better. We had two full meals onboard additionally the cabin crew were available throughout the flight offering snacks and hot and cold drinks. The First-Class cabin is very comfortable and when it came time to sleep my family and I had a good rest. The cabin crew were very attentive to me, my wife and two children. Nothing was any bother for them, and they always greeted us with a re-assuring heartwarming Garuda-Indonesia smile. I recently read that Garuda-Indonesia on June 20th, 2023, was awarded the Best Cabin Crew 2023 and I would fully endorse this as they were outstanding on our flight. Therefore, I would like to thank the Garuda-Indonesia Cabin crew Margaretha Bernadette, Mardiana, Ade Kurniawan, Nesyanti for their help and assistance to me and my family, they certainly made us feel at home. Upon arrival in Amsterdam, we were met at the plane door by the Schiphol VIP Center team which is part of Garuda Indonesia service. We transferred to the VIP lounge to await our connecting flight. Wi-Fi is available onboard, however it is expensive for 250Mb limit.

Overall, I was impressed with the level of service and attention to detail. The seats were comfortable and the cabin was clean. Additionally, the in-flight entertainment system was easy to use. From the check-in counter to the cabin crew, everyone was courteous and helpful. I felt that the safety of passengers was a top priority. However, during first service, the snack was disappointing. Potentially because I requested special meal "Hindu Non Vegetarian". I only received an apple, while the others received lukewarm bread roll with a meat filling. Fortunately, the second service was delicious. Bonus points for offering real cutlery in economy class. It was a pleasant experience. They only have to elevate their food and beverage service by offering more frequent and bigger portions/tray. In addition, offering snacks in between would be greatly appreciated.

They deserve the 5 stars. I was satisfied with their ground service, cabin service, food and beverage was good and the cabin crew hospitality was awesome. The only thing I would say is they should just drop the mask requirement for cabin crew so that we can see their lovely smiles, as we are over covid.

I flew with Garuda Indonesia from Jakarta to Singapore return. I booked this flight a month in advance. The flight to Singapore on went smooth without delay or any problems. The Female Flight attendant who served meal was polite and professional. The meal was mee goreng and was a decent meal. The plane arrived on Time . The flight from Singapore to Jakarta on was the opposite. The Female Flight Attendant was impolite and unfriendly towards me. My meal was bad (pad thai). The plane arrived about 10 minutes late.

Review_Title: "ground and cabin crew were very helpful"
Review: GA402 from Jakarta to Denpasar Bali. Jakarta Terminal-3 was quite busy even though it was early morning, however check-in was fast and efficient. I was escorted through security and into the lounge by Ms. Firyal from the Garuda Premium Team ground staff. When it came time to board Ms. Firyal was on hand to help and assist. Onboard the cabin crew were quite busy serving breakfast and there were two choices. I chose the omelet which was quite good and well prepared. The cabin crew kept coming around and offering additional hot and cold drinks throughout the short flight. Although it was a short journey both the ground and cabin crew were very helpful.

Review_Title: "noticed some improvements in the First Class"
Review: I travelled on Garuda Indonesia on GA88 from Jakarta to Amsterdam. Pick up from home to the airport was on time and the ground staff were very pleasant, professional, and eager to assist. Next step on boarding the flight was equally nice with the help of Eca. I would especially like to mention the cabin crew from Purser Yudiana Sari, MDC Eriandini, Iga Dita, and Chef Yudi Mulyadi who introduced themselves to all First-Class passengers and were very attentive throughout the flight. I didn’t eat at first as I wanted to get some sleep as it was an overnight flight, however there was a good selection of food for breakfast and the presentation and taste was excellent overall a great experience. I also noticed some improvements in the First Class onboard which was refreshing. Additionally the free Wi-Fi connectivity was very good.

Review_Title: "success to Garuda Indonesia and their team"
Review: Flew on GA89 Amsterdam-Jakarta. For First Class passengers check in is at the VIP Lounge were all facilities such as check in, immigration is carried out. This is a great service as there is no need for queuing to check in. When time for boarding the VIP Team escort you to the plane. As it was an overnight flight and going through many time zones the captain gave announcement over India welcoming in the new year and wishing all passengers a Happy New Year the cabin crew and passengers happily welcomed in the New Year The First-Class cabin crew, which was made up of Vivi, Sentry, Cherlida, and the Chef Deni provided excellent service throughout the flight. Additionally, I was provided with two main meals and there was a very good menu selection. There was also a good selection snacks and drinks available throughout the flight. On arrival in Jakarta, I was met by Eca from Frist Class Team who escorted me through immigration, customs and out the car provided by Garuda to take me home. I also met Pak Akbar manager from the Ground support Team. Thank you, Pak Akbar. Another great flight on Garuda Indonesia and Happy New Year and success to Garuda Indonesia and their team both in the air and on the ground for 2023.

Flew on Garuda Indonesia on the GA 405 flight from Denpasar, Bali to Jakarta. I picked up from my hotel by a car provided by Garuda Indonesia and upon arrival at the airport I was meet by Qaulan the First-Class representative who assisted me with check in, security and through to the lounge where I was put in a VIP room, although small it was more than adequate. There was a good selection of food available in the lounge, however I chose to wait until after take-off. Qaulan assisted me when I was boarding and escorted me to the plane, the Garuda Cabin crew were very welcoming, and I knew one of the cabin crew Ruth and she was very helpful during the flight as was Eka. Thank you both for your help and service during the flight. The flight took just over 1 hour and 40 minutes and after landing and when the plane door was opened, I was met by Afrizal from the Jakarta Garuda First Class team who escorted me to the baggage hall and assisted in me in getting my luggage. He then escorted me outside the terminal building to a waiting car that was provided by Garuda Indonesia to take me home. Thank you to Ruth and Eka onboard the flight and Afrizal the ground support staff in Jakarta for providing an excellent service.

Review_Title: "Thank you for providing a great service"
Review: Flew on Garuda Indonesia on the GA 408 flight from Jakarta to Denpasar, Bali. During check in I was meet by Garuda First Class and she help and assisted me through the check in process and through security to the Garuda lounge where I was put in a VIP room, although small was it was more than adequate. There was a good selection of food available in the lounge including breakfast and the lounge team were on hand to take my order. Assisted me when boarding and escorted me to the plane, the Garuda Cabin crew were on hand to welcome me and direct me to my seat. After take-off, a choice of 3 meals was offered and I chose to go with a steak, however there was a full 3 course meal presented all tasted good including the starter. The flight took just over 1 hour and 35 minutes and after landing and when the plane door was opened, I was meet by the Denpasar Garuda First Class team who escorted me to the baggage hall and assisted in getting my luggage. He then escorted me outside the terminal building to meet my hotel contacted. In fact, they had contacted the hotel representative in advance to advise them I had landed, therefore I was on my way to the hotel within 15 minutes after landing. Thank you for providing a great service.

Flew on Garuda Indonesia on GA 89 from Amsterdam to Jakarta. I was picked up at my hotel in Amsterdam by a car provided by Garuda Indonesia. I was taken directly to the VIP center, and they assisted me with check-in and provided me with my boarding pass. The service in the VIP lounge was very good with breakfast and other snacks being served. When the time came to board, we were taken by bus to the plane that was parked in a remote location. The hotel pick up, and lounge service was excellent. When boarding the plane, the Garuda Cabin crew were on hand to welcome us with a warm welcoming Indonesian smile After takeoff we were provided with an extensive menu of multi course meals. The overall choice of meals was excellent, and I chose the salmon which was very well presented and tasted even better. I would like to thank the cabin staff Zelvanya, Pungkisari, Anisa, and Chef Angga for their infight service throughout the flight. They were amazing and very attentive and friendly and were on hand throughout the flight.
